description: Try our easy to follow Chia Seed Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chia Seed Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup black and white chia seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Once the nuts/seeds are lightly brown place into food processor along with the dates, cinnamon and maple syrup, blend until just combined. Transfer into a bowl and add in the chia seeds, sesame seeds and 3 tbsp water and give a good mix. Pour ingredients into baking dish and really flatten the mixture out and compress down with the back of a spoon. Sprinkle coconut on top and again press down with the back of a spoon. Place in the freezer for 30 minutes until set. Stores well in the fridge or freezer. Recipe by Kim Beach.
